banner.description: Together we will provide our protectors with reliable transportation.

about.title: About the project
about.description-one: Trucks4u is a volunteer initiative that supports those who protect us. We provide free delivery of pickup trucks and other vehicles to the Armed Forces of Ukraine—where they are needed most.
about.description-two: We search for reliable vehicles, inspect their technical condition, handle all documentation, and personally deliver them directly to combat units. Our mission is to equip Ukrainian defenders with vehicles they can depend on.
about.description-three: This is only possible thanks to people who refuse to stay on the sidelines. All assistance is fully transparent: every hryvnia goes directly toward a specific vehicle for a specific unit.Together, we are moving closer to victory.

attainment.title: Our achievements
attainment.unit: The units have already received the equipment.

donate.title: Help us get closer to victory
donate.description-one: Fuel and spare parts - the things without which no pickup will go.
donate.description-two: Make your contribution to the reliability of equipment for defenders.
donate.description-three: Every donation is a mile towards victory.

one.title: Transparency
one.description: We publicly report on income and expenses on the website.

two.title: Focus
two.description: We respond quickly to requests and meet the needs of individual departments.

ten.name: Semiroz Dmytro

home.awards: Awards and recognition to the fund.

title.one: Help repair and deliver vehicles for the Armed Forces of Ukraine.
title.two: Every hryvnia brings us closer to victory. We are raising funds to repair vehicles for units performing combat missions on the front lines. Your contribution is a step towards the safety and success of our defenders.
